0: I was unfortunately here on business so did not get to enjoy many of the amenities but this was a first class hotel with first class service
My family did the snow actives I pretty much stayed in the gym and spa when I was not shopping
We also learned that much of the traffic congestion that day was typical Saturday traffic caused skiers leaving the ski resorts which stop their lifts between 30 pm and 330 pm
water coolers in the lobby completely empty for hours at a time lounge service that was slow as molasses not due to the staff necessarily
There were little things in the lobby area that were not up to Four Seasons standards

While weather and traffic accidents are beyond anyones knowledge knowledge of local traffic patterns based on the day of the week which Kate did point out and the impact of other local events such as ski lift closing times should be common knowledge by any concierge team and thoughtfully communicated to their guests
It was on the bathroom counter with all my toiletries so I knew where it was
The hotel entrance faces north so GPS will not guide you to the front door
We like everything in the hotel the rooms the facilities no question about that at alBut the responsiveness of the security front desk management is a joke
The rooms and additional amenities were at the same level
1: The workout facility something important to me wherever I stay was very good and offered a wide variety of machines cardio and resistence and free weights

Skiing is effortless and movement of equipment is very efficient and the facilities at the base of the mountain take every bit of the unpleasant trek with boots and skis at the end of the day away and replaces it with the ability to hand your skis over at the base of the mountain for them to be returned waxed and tuned the following morning
The staff dining and accommodations exceeded our expectations
This is an amazing hotel with fantastic amenities the kids loved the complimentary kids club and the staff are all very friendly and helpful
The spa and all the amenities were very clean and welcoming
Ski concierge service which is true luxury literally brings your skis and equipment to the gondola entrance at the mountain from their village ski client services location
it is all encompassing with great rooms great food many many amenities that would are available to all of your family members
This facility is the total package from the physical amenities to the excellent and attentive associates who represent the resort
The spa facility is truly a treat and they keep it bvery clean
